convertRights() convertRightsDashboard DashboardconvertRights
static convertRights (array $raw_rights = [] )[static]
Convert right from DB entries to a array with type foreign keys. Ex: IN [ [ 'itemtype' => 'Entity' 'items_id' => yyy ], [ ... ], ]
OUT [ 'entities_id' => [...] 'profiles_id' => [...] 'users_id' => [...] 'groups_id' => [...] ]
Paramètres
array$raw_rights
right from DB
Renvoie
array converter rights

load() loadDashboard Dashboardload
load (bool $force = false )
Retrieve the current dashboard from the DB (or from cache) with its rights and items
Paramètres
bool$force
if true, don't use cache
Renvoie
false|int Id of the loaded dashboard, or false on failure

Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :
saveItems() saveItemsDashboard DashboardsaveItems
saveItems (array $items = [] )
Save items in DB for the current dashboard
Paramètres
array$items
cards of the dashboard, contains:
gridstack_id: unique id of the card in the grid, usually build like card_id.uuidv4
card_id: key of array return by getAllDasboardCards
x: position in grid
y: position in grid
width: size in grid
height: size in grid
card_options, sub array, depends on the card, contains at least a key color
Renvoie
void
saveNew() saveNewDashboard DashboardsaveNew
saveNew (string $title = "" , string $context = "core" , array $items = [] , array $rights = [] )
Save the current dashboard instance to DB
Paramètres
string$title
label of the dasbhoard, will be suglified to have a corresponding key
string$context
of the dasbhoard, filter the dasboard collection by a key
array$items
cards for the dashboard
array$rights
for the dasbhoard
Renvoie
string
saveRights() saveRightsDashboard DashboardsaveRights
saveRights (array $rights = [] )
Save rights (share) in DB for the current dashboard
Paramètres
array$rights
contains these data:
'users_id' => [items_id]
'groups_id' => [items_id]
'entities_id' => [items_id]
'profiles_id' => [items_id]
Renvoie
void
